Introduction¶

A python library to creaete and use mzQC files. Specifically, the library facilitates access to mzQC files in form of a directly usable object representation of mzQC and offers additional functionality to:

  • serialise

  • deserialise

  • syntactic checks

  • semantic checks

mzQC-pylib
